statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ 2 \\ 7 \\ -11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ 3 \\ -6 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
